messages.text: Based on the document content, PAC stands for Passive-Aggressive Classifier, which is an online learning method used for binary classification tasks. It is described as adapting dynamically based on prediction outcomes, becoming aggressive when errors occur and adjusting model parameters, and remaining passive when predictions are correct.
